I would LOVE to, however I am stretched to my limit here. I would have
to let these NPC's I control fade back into the background of the moon,
and just keep Myrmidon active. I have no problem with that, but I think
we have a few folks intent on hitting the moon with some serious
firepower. :)

Preston

--- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> How many members here would be interested in starting a sister RPG to
> branch off of NBW? Sometime ago I started the story arc of having a
> third Great War break out on Cybertron between the Maximals and
> Predacons as well as any remaining Autobots and Decepticons. Plus
> there is the G2 Decepticons attacking future Earth. I figure we could
> do a RPG set in either of these battles. This would allow for new
> characters to be created and bring the NBW universe to a wider scale.
>    
>   I like the idea of having it mostly based on Cybertron with maybe
> little threads branching off to the G2 conflict on Earth.
>    
>   I would put the RPG on Yahoo groups and have it run the exact same
> way as NBW.
>    
>   So get back to me. Who wants the Neo Cybertron Wars RPG?
> 
>        
> ---------------------------------
